text: The quotes/phrases on a lot of the big Julia packages never fail to crack me up. Adds a lot of personality to the ecosystem

elements.text: The quotes/phrases on a lot of the big Julia packages never fail to crack me up. Adds a lot of personality to the ecosystem

text: Thats one of the things that actually drew me away from just observing the community and instead taking part in it. Smart people with personalities are my kinds of people. Smart people too embroiled in rigor, or too too afraid to have some fun, are only inviting too people cut from the same proverbial cloth - or something. A little whimsy goes a long way to breaking up the monotony.
